comments.body:
I'm curious if showing the `unambiguous` is a bit verbose to the user.
```suggestion
    s"Import all possible missing symbols"
```
What do you think?
I think we could just join all the textEdits into a single text edit, which might help with the tests and the additional newline.

I managed to fix everything that way without changing anything to the TextEdits.scala file. I don't know if this is the right way but it seems that imports are always coming in different order so maybe it is.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +73,77 @@        allSymbols.setKind(l.CodeActionKind.QuickFix)
        allSymbols.setDiagnostics(diags.asJava)
        allSymbols.setEdit(new l.WorkspaceEdit(Map(uri -> edits.asJava).asJava))

        allSymbols +: codeActions
